featured.text: He has been _____ to all his friends about how cool it looks and how fast it runs.
For instance, a ventilated hard hat was developed to keep wearers cooler, and see-through face shields were attached to better see the hazards lurking above.
Drinking, the message goes, is cool.

The new development has several important features: use of wind and solar energy, passive heating and cooling systems, as well as concrete runways in place of asphalt, which has a greater carbon footprint during its production cycle.

other.text: The donkey jumped into the stream to cool ___(32)___.
The roasting heat and high ______ made me feel hot and sticky, no matter what I did to cool off.

definition.en_def: Of a moderately low temperature; fashionable or impressive.
definition.example: The weather is cool today, perfect for a picnic.
